entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Algonquin Park (Brent)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 04:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: SE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
